mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_TEL , USER_PARENT_TEL , TO_CHAR(USER_SIGNUPDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') user_signupdate FROM USER_ACCOUNT WHERE user_cate_no = 1 ORDER BY USER_NO

SELECT USER_NO , USER_CATE_NO , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_ADDR , USER_TEL , USER_PARENT_TEL , USER_GENDER , TO_CHAR(USER_BIRTHDAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') USER_BIRTHDAY , USER_SIGNUPDATE , USER_SCHOOL , USER_GRADE FROM USER_ACCOUNT WHERE user_cate_no = 1 AND user_no = #{user_no}
